CustomField.description: Lookup field to Primary Sales Rep Object Not required on any layouts or record types Field is pre-populated (but editable) with the Primary Sales Rep tied to the related Account When an Account Primary Sales Rep field is changed, each related Contact that has that has the same Primary Sales Rep as the Account prior to the action is updated so that Opportunity.Primary_Sales_Rep_Name__c = Account.Primary_Sales_Rep_Name__c
CustomField.label: Primary Sales Rep Name
